name: Priest
description: A path focused on divine magic and healing

skills.name: Healing
skills.description: As an action, you can touch a living creature other than yourself or a construct and it recovers damage equal to its healing rate. The target can benefit from your Healing only once per hour.

skills.name: Spellcasting
skills.description: You can cast spells. You learn one spell chosen from your tradition, of a level for which you have a spell slot. You also prepare all other spells available from your tradition.

choices.description: You discover one tradition of magic.

skills.name: Turn Undead
skills.description: You present a holy symbol and choose one undead creature within medium range that can see you. The target must make a Will challenge roll. On a failure, it becomes frightened for 1 minute or until it takes damage. While it is frightened in this way, the undead uses its action to move directly away from you, taking the safest route. It cannot move closer to you unless it cannot otherwise move, and it cannot take any actions other than to move.

skills.name: Censure Heresy
skills.description: If a creature within 10 yards of you uses a spell from a tradition of magic that your tradition of magic opposes, you can use a triggered action to immediately make an Intellect challenge roll with 1 boon. On a success, the spellcaster must reroll the attack roll and use the worse result, or any affected targets reroll challenge rolls against the spell and use the better result.

skills.name: Improved Healing
skills.description: Your Healing talent heals damage equal to twice the target's healing rate.
